summary: REQ-22 and REQ-23 appear implemented in YesTapSequence.tsx: the sequence is now 2 images + final message with looping and keyboard support, and it preloads the two remaining images. REQ-24 is not evidenced in the diff summary (no asset removal shown). Also, the updated user-facing strings include non-English/emoji text, which conflicts with the BuildRequest constraint to keep all user-facing text in English.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the unused third image asset (IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg) from frontend public assets if it exists and ensure there are no remaining references to it in the codebase.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no removed files and no edits indicating deletion of IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg or cleanup of any references to it.
evidence: frontend/src/components/YesTapSequence.tsx (truncated) shows references only to WA0002 and WA0000, but does not evidence removal of WA0001 from assets or codebase-wide reference cleanup

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained non-English and emoji-heavy user-facing text in the final message and tap prompts.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint requires all user-facing text in English; the diff includes text like "meri cutiee" and multiple emojis in user-visible strings.
